holidays.title: National Waitstaff Day
holidays.description: Let’s turn the tables, and serve these special people a super-sized helping of our appreciation.

holidays.title: Eat More Fruits and Vegetables Day
holidays.description: Prepare your tummy for a healthy treat as we celebrate Eat More Fruits and Vegetables Day.

holidays.title: Emergency Medical Services Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the efforts of E.M.S. providers, from E.M.T.s to ambulance drivers.

holidays.title: End of the World
holidays.description: End of the World Day reminds us how fake apocalypse warnings distress people around the world.

holidays.title: I Need a Patch For That Day
holidays.description: We’re ready to patch everything up and think outside the box on this quirky holiday!

holidays.title: International AIDS Candlelight Memorial
holidays.description: This memorial gives us a chance to pause and remember those who have died of AIDS.

holidays.title: International Tea Day
holidays.description: People across the world drink more than two billion cups of tea every day.

holidays.title: National American Red Cross Founder’s Day
holidays.description: Gain some insight into the founder of the American Red Cross, and the organization itself.

holidays.title: National Memo Day
holidays.description: A memo is any piece of important information that is penned or typed down.

holidays.title: National Strawberries and Cream Day
holidays.description: Fresh strawberries and cream is the best treat to indulge in, on a hot day.

holidays.title: National Talk Like Yoda Day
holidays.description: Yoda fans honor the day we first met the wisest little green guy in the galaxy.

holidays.title: National Waiters and Waitresses Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Waiters and Waitresses Day today.

holidays.title: Navy Day Chile
holidays.description: Learn why Navy Day is so important in Chile and how the locals celebrate it.

holidays.title: Rapture Party Day
holidays.description: Instead of being fearful on this day, enjoy it as much as you can!

holidays.title: Rural Life Sunday
holidays.description: This Sunday, you’ll be enjoying a day filled with celebrations, worship, and remembrance.

holidays.title: Sister Maria Hummel Day
holidays.description: Sister Maria Hummel Day honors this Franciscan nun and artist, whose work is highly admired.

holidays.title: Stepmother's Day
holidays.description: Stepmother’s Day takes place to appreciate all the stepmothers around the world.

holidays.title: Take Your Parents To The Playground Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to playing outdoors — for parents.

holidays.title: World Baking Day
holidays.description: Whether it be a biscuit, bagel, or muffin, World Baking Day is for you to make them from scratch.

holidays.title: World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development
holidays.description: Learn how to celebrate World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development.

holidays.title: World Fish Migration Day
holidays.description: World Fish Migration Day advocates for the protection of migratory fish and their natural habitat.

holidays.title: World Meditation Day
holidays.description: It’s time to relax and take a deep breath this World Meditation Day.

holidays.title: Josh Allen’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s young but he’s already made football history — let’s celebrate Josh Allen today!

holidays.title: Noel Fielding’s Birthday
holidays.description: A man of many talents, there is nothing that Noel Fielding cannot do!

holidays.title: Notorious B.I.G.’s Birthday
holidays.description: He had a great career and hit the right notes on the rapping scene.
